channel.title: Mopar Monthly #7
channel.description:
If there are any suggestions or thoughts for things we should include in March's edition of the Mopar Monthly, leave a reply below. On February 21st we'll start writing the actual article.
[ul][li]Interview with Tree[/li] [li]Introduction of #help bot (Written by John)[/li] [li]...[/li][/ul]

item.title: Mopar Monthly #7
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Sure thing, any ideas? Some that come to mind are a model contest, programming contest, SoTW, and a riddle that none of us are able to solve.
